game.name: PAYDAY 2: Hotline Miami
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Do you like hurting other people?The Hotline Miami DLC is the eleventh DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and is a collaboration between Dennaton Games and OVERKILL.Enjoy an all-new heist, five new melee weapons, three new submachine guns, a ton of mods and eight new masks, patterns and materials - all of it ins
